description:
Made with some of the finest ingredients available, this bar beautifully balances the bright sweetness of raisins, with rich toasted almonds, and smooth milk chocolate.

  • Ingredients: milk chocolate [sugar, cocoa solids 33%* (cocoa mass & pure cocoa butter), NZ milk powder 30%*, emulsifier (soy lecithin), vanilla flavour]; roasted almonds 14% ; raisins 14%. * Minimum percentage
  • Allergens, may contain: milk, peanuts, other tree nuts and gluten
  • Whittaker’s is New Zealand’s finest chocolate and has been since 1896
  • Ghanian cocoa pods are sun-dried before processing in small batches in Porirua New Zealand
  • Rainforest alliance certified
name: Whittaker's Fruit and Nut Chocolate
